programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: The history of driver bans in Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 drivers very rarely get banned from races - in fact, just five times in the history of the world championship has a driver sat out a race due to an official FIA sanction. But, unsurprisingly, F1's history of bans is a bit more complicated than that, so in this video we also look at the other drivers who have served what could be termed as 'unofficial' bans over the course of F1 history.

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

But, unsurprisingly, F1's history of bans is a bit more complicated than that, so in this video we also look at the other drivers who have served what could be termed as 'unofficial' bans over the course of F1 history.

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: The history of driver bans in Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 drivers very rarely get banned from races - in fact, just five times in the history of the world championship has a driver sat out a race due to an official FIA sanction. But, unsurprisingly, F1's history of bans is a bit more complicated than that, so in this video we also look at the other drivers who have served what could be termed as 'unofficial' bans over the course of F1 history.

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: Inside Surfing Ep.2
programme.desc: Inside Surfing tells the stories about the people, places and things that make surfing so special. Is it a sport, an art form or a lifestyle, or all three at the same time? The series provides a look behind the scenes of surfing with all its facets.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2020 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: Sunny
programme.desc: Level 1 injected a positive mood into the ski season – giving a dose of light therapy to dark northern landscapes of Scandinavia, Alaska, Japan and British Columbia. So sit back and relax, put your shades on and soak up the rays- the future looks bright.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #01
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Daily Highlights Stage #02
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Winter Games 2017 - Freeride Ski & Snowboard - New Zealand
programme.desc: Stunning scenery, world’s best talent and Kiwi hospitality is set to be showcased to a global audience with Winter Games New Zealand revealing its most diverse event yet. Winter Olympic, Paralympic and X Games stars are heading to New Zealand once again.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour 2106/17 - Part 1 - Italy
programme.desc: The World Snowboard Federation (WSF) is the international organization exclusively working to develop the sport of snowboarding at all levels, especially with worldwide events four young and talented riders.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Moscow (RUS)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Snow Bike Festival 2019 - Gstaad (SUI)
programme.desc: The Snow Bike Festival 2019 is THE event of the young snow bike boom and brings together like-minded athletes from all over the world. With the extra wide and grippy wheels you are ready for your exciting ride in the snow.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Hakuba (JPN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour (FWT) has expanded to Asia! The season opener of the world's most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders takes place in Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Deutschnofen (ITA)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Kicking Horse, Golden BC (CAN)
programme.desc: After an epic start to Winter 2019 in Hakuba, Japan, the world's best make their way across the Pacific to North America for the second competition of FWT19 at the legendary Canadian Rockies resort of Kicking Horse, Golden BC.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Championships 2019 - Latzfons (ITA)
programme.desc: Im Gegensatz zu künstlichen Rodelbahnen bestehenden Naturbahnen aus Bergstraßen und -wegen. Naturbahnrodeln erfordert eine völlig andere Technik als auf einer Kunstbahn. Im Ziel entscheiden Hundertstelsekunden über Sieg oder Niederlage.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: With two events in the pipeline and a fiercely competitive race for the world title quickly unfolding, the best in the world will get their chance to “Hold The Line” in Fieberbrunn as FWT19 enters the European leg of the season.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Ordino Arcalis (AND)
programme.desc: It's that time of the season again when points mean everything: racing for the world title, qualifying for the final in Verbier and the 2020 season. The stage is set for what is sure to be a hard-fought competition in Ordino Arcalís

programme.title: Episode 52
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 52

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: WOF 2024 #38: Ötztal Cycle Marathon (AUT)
programme.desc: The Ötztal Cycle Marathon 2024 in Austria, taking place on the 1st of September, is the most challenging cycling marathon in the Alps, offering a captivating mix of valley and high alpine terrain. The course spans 227 kilometers and over 4,000 participants.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: Keep On Keeping On
programme.desc: Keep On Keeping On - Dreaming of Rampage portraits Johny Salidos career and his long way to compete at the Rampage - the holy grail of freeride mountainbiking.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #39: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup France
programme.desc: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup France - Dunkerque (FRA)Welcome to World of Freesports…and Bienvenue to France. The famous beaches of the french Harbour-city are once again home to GKA Kitesurfers. This Episode we will have a look at happend there on and of the water.

programme.title: World Cup - Dubai International Baja - Daily Highl
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Recap
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Recap

programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2020 "Live Summary"

programme.title: Inside Surfing Ep.6
programme.desc: Inside Surfing tells the stories about the people, places and things that make surfing so special. Is it a sport, an art form or a lifestyle, or all three at the same time? The series provides a look behind the scenes of surfing with all its facets.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: IWSA Formula Wing World Championships - Live delay
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistan's Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: Outdoorsports Team - The Fascination of ski Mountaineering

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. It's the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 1, Martinique
programme.desc: The Strongman Champions League kicks off its 2014 season in Martinique.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 2, Germany FIBO Power
programme.desc: The second stage of 2014 Strongman champions League, in Cologne, Germany. 14 athletes from 12 different countries battled through six events on the second stop

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 3, Serbia
programme.desc: The third episode is hosted in Serbia where world records are broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: The fourth episode takes place in Finland with events such as Bus Pull and the forward hold

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 5, Holland
programme.desc: The next stage of the SCL takes place in Holland with events such as the Atlas Stones and Truck Pull being witnessed

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: The SCL is in full swing and the sixth stage takes place in Latvia where the men are eager to break a national record held here

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 7, Portugal
programme.desc: The competition continues in Portugal with 6 events and thousands of spectators

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 8, Croatia
programme.desc: Episode 8 takes place in 36 degree heat in Croatia and sees the return of Krzysztof Radzikowski after a 2 month absence due to injury

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 9, Poland
programme.desc: SCL returns to Poland with 12 athletes all battling for the number one title

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary
programme.desc: The 10th stage takes place in Hungary and features new super talent!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.desc: This event featured the number one contender fight between Alim Nabiev and the former Glory Welterweight Champion Cedric Doumbe as Superfight Series headliner.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The event featured the long-awaited rematch between former champion Badr Hari and Hesdy Gerges as Glory 51 headliner. This event also featured a 4-Man Welterweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Welterweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Kickboxing’s Summer of GLORY concluded with a massive event from the Johan Cruijff Arena in Amsterdam. In the night’s headliner, heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven took on Brazilian challenger Guto Inocente. Verhoeven had defended his belt seven straight times since capturing the title in 2014. His winning streak inside the GLORY ring stood at 16. Inocente looked to dethrone the world’s top-ranked heavyweight riding the momentum of wins over Benjamin Adegbuyi, D’Angelo Marshall and Hesdy Gerges. Gold was also on the line in the co-main event, as longtime featherweight titleholder Robin van Roosmalen rematched interim champion Petchpanomrung Kiatmookao. The pair met previously at...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY is bringing out the heavy hitters for their final show of 2018, as an eight-man heavyweight tournament has been set for Rotterdam. Headlined by former heavyweight contender tournament winner Benjamin Adegbuyi and Jamal Ben Saddik as the top two seed, the winner will go on to win $100,000 for making it through the eight-man, three-round affair.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.desc: In this rematch, Roman Zentzov and Kristof Midoux, two heavyweight fighters try to out-strike and outlast each other for a second time. This fight drew some of the biggest cheers during the live PPV event in St Petersburg. Reknown Russian fighter Andrei Semenov put his exceptional takedown defense, stamina and throws to the test against the hard striking Jorge Santiago.

programme.title: Article 15
programme.desc: In the village of Lalgaon, two Dalit girls are abducted from a school bus. IPS officer Ayan Ranjan is assigned to the case and works closely with officers Brahmdutt and Jatav. As Ayan investigates, he discovers that deep-rooted caste discrimination prevails among the villagers. He reconnects with an old friend, Satinder, who behaves oddly and mysteriously goes missing the next morning. Soon after, the bodies of the two girls are found hanging from a tree, while a third girl remains missing. The autopsy reveals that the victims were raped multiple times. Gaura, the sister of one of the deceased girls, informs Ayan that they were slapped by their employer, Anshu, for demanding a raise of...

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Black And White
programme.desc: A suicide bomber is sent to India to kill people during India's Independence Day celebrations. His life changes when he befriends a professor to successfully carry out his mission.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E38 Jodha Akbar S4 E38
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Cheeni Kam
programme.desc: Cheeni Kum is a heartwarming romantic drama centered on Buddhadev Gupta, a grumpy 64-year-old chef who runs a top Indian restaurant in London. His life takes a turn when he clashes with Nina Verma, a spirited 34-year-old who critiques his cooking. Realizing his mistake, he apologizes, and the two gradually fall in love despite their 30-year age gap. When Buddhadev travels to Delhi to ask Nina's father for her hand, he is shocked and refuses, disturbed by their age difference—especially since Buddhadev is older than him. In protest, Nina’s father begins a satyagraha (fast unto death). The story explores love, age, societal norms, and emotional courage.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: BMW Motorsport, Season 1976
programme.desc: In the 1970s the 3 Litre BMW CSL was one of the dream cars in the Bavarian manufacturer's motorsports history. In the 1976 season not only this model celebrated successes in several international racing competitions.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera Cup 1990
programme.desc: 1990 was an extremely thrilling year at the Porsche Carrera Cup, the fastest and most exciting one-make racing event. Porsche started with the new Carrera 2 Cup Coupe with 265hp generated by a powerful 6-cylinder engine.

programme.title: The Golden Age of Rally Sports
programme.desc: The late 1950s saw the dawn of the Golden Age of rally motorsports. Rally racing became a professional sport and the automotive industry began to build tougher cars, whereas drivers started to specialize in competitive motorsports.

programme.title: Alois Ruf
programme.desc: Alois Ruf is the founder of a small, but well-known car manufacturing company in Bavaria that specialises in building their own vision of street legal super sports cars on the foundation of Porsche bodys.

programme.title: Prince Leopold von Bayern
programme.desc: Coming from a famous noble family, Prince Leopold of Bavaria started a career as a rally driver in the 1960s before switching to touring cars. He successfully took part in several international races for the Porsche and BMW brands.

programme.title: German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: Ron Williams and his Cadillac
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. One owner of this rare classic car is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams.

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Ron Williams and his Cadillac
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. One owner of this rare classic car is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera RS
programme.desc: In the early 1970s the Porsche Carrera RS was the fastest and most agile production sports car in Germany. Today the RS is a Porsche classic with highest acclaim.

programme.title: Driving pleasure in winter
programme.desc: Slippery or muddy roads and bad visibility are circumstances that often spoil driving pleasure in winter. We took two almost identical Porsche 911's to an icy test track. Also: drifting fun in the snow with the Suzuki SX4 S-Cross.

programme.title: Parking Wars
programme.desc: Not only in the big cities it's a growing struggle for parking spots. . We took the BMW X6, the Citroen Cactus and the Smart forfour to town in order to find out how these cars would cope in this situation and surrounding.

programme.title: Primm 300
programme.desc: 500 kilometres of sand and dust. The Primm 300 is the world's toughest desert rally. We accompanied the former European Rally champion Armin Schwarz to one of his toughest challenges, from the first preparations and trial runs to the finish line.

programme.title: The SUV Desert Challenge
programme.desc: Offroad legend Duncan Barbour took a group of men to Oman in order to test the off-road capabilities of the Mercedes-Benz SUV models. Also: how does the Mercedes Benz GL, a 7-seater full-size luxury SUV, perform in the urban jungle of Dubai?

programme.title: Volkswagen Beetle
programme.desc: A success story that was made in Germany: The Volkswagen Beetle. No other car has ever moved the masses so much, both in distances, as well as emotions.

programme.title: Pistenbully
programme.desc: The Pistenbully is a made in Germany powerpack traversing the ski slopes all over the world. For over 40 years it has been the undisputed number 1 among the snow groomers.

programme.title: Walter Röhrl
programme.desc: One cannot talk about rally sports without mentioning the name Walter Röhrl. From an early age, Röhrl showed his talent in rally sports and won the European, World and other international rally championships several times in his career.

programme.title: Hans-Joachim Stuck
programme.desc: Hans-Joachim Stuck is one of the best racing drivers in Germany. Over his long career he not only won the Formula II and several international touring car championships multiple times but also the famous 24-hour race of Le Mans twice.

programme.title: All-Wheel Vehicles for the Streets
programme.desc: The Audi Q2 is a sportback coupe is the entry-level model for the German brand’s SUV range. Also: test-driving the SsangYong XLV lifestyle SUV. And: Mercedes present their "sportscar among SUVs", the GLC Coupe.

programme.title: Wildly through the desert
programme.desc: BMW and the German racing team X-Raid take part in the Dakar Rally with a transformed Mini Countryman. Also: the Mercedes G63 AMG 6x6, a 6-wheel off-road monster. And: the Kia Sportage feels both at home in the rocky terrain of Sicily and the city.

programme.title: Tuning World
programme.desc: For more than 20 years the Tuning World Bodensee has been one of the top events in the European car tuning scene. Also: with their i-models BMW started to explore alternative drive technologies. And: taking the Nissan Leaf to Oslo.

programme.title: All New!
programme.desc: Following the Porsche 911's anniversary we take a look back at this iconic model's history. Also: the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with a diesel engine, the Volvo V60. And: safety measures in the car world, from seatbelts to crash tests.

programme.title: Enduro Park Hechlingen
programme.desc: The BMW Enduro Park Hechlingen in Bavaria offers off-road driving pleasure both for beginners and pros alike on 26 hectares. We take a look at what this exciting place has to offer for enduro enthusiasts. Also: what does the inexpensive Hyosung ST 700 i from South Korea have to offer? And: the big-wheeled scooter from Taiwan, the Kymco People GT 300i.

programme.title: Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft 1995
programme.desc: The 1995 Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was exciting, tough and thrilling, with a strong international competition. Despite this great challenge, Mercedes driver Bernd Schneider dominated the race and won the title.

programme.title: Women and their Classic Cars
programme.desc: A small group of car enthusiastic ladies offers resistance in the otherwise man dominated classic car world. One of them is Johanna. The 24-year-old loves her 1969 Corvette more than everything.

programme.title: Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Tuning World
programme.desc: For more than 20 years the Tuning World Bodensee has been one of the top events in the European car tuning scene. Also: with their i-models BMW started to explore alternative drive technologies. And: taking the Nissan Leaf to Oslo.

programme.title: All New!
programme.desc: Following the Porsche 911's anniversary we take a look back at this iconic model's history. Also: the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with a diesel engine, the Volvo V60. And: safety measures in the car world, from seatbelts to crash tests.

programme.title: High Society
programme.desc: Rolls-Royce and Bentley are the ultimate upper class status symbols. Those who prefer a sportier approach can choose from a great range of brands like Bugatti, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche and McLaren that compete for the title of best sports car.

programme.title: Supercars on the Rocks
programme.desc: Nissan's all-wheel monster GT-R had to prove its winter suitability and the new Porsche 911 with turbo engine was taken to its limits in Finnish Lapland. Also: the Mercedes-Benz S 500 plug-in hybrid.

programme.title: The Graduate
programme.desc: A vehicle jumps at full speed over four cars, which explode one after the other. It’s a matter of precision and timing for the Stunt Heroes. Also, up-and-coming stuntwoman Tina has to prove her skills.

programme.title: The Very First Time
programme.desc: The team is shooting a car rollover. Stunt coordinator Carl wants to go all out. He adds an exciting shootout to the mix. Also, he has a surprise for his boss. During the rollover he wants him to sit in the passenger seat, for the very first time.

programme.title: Episode 22
programme.desc: At the Nuerburgring Patrick chased a 12-cylinder Aston Martin Zagato down the track. Also on the show: a Hummer, a Renault Clio and a Frenchman in a Ferrari.

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: RS is not enough
programme.desc: After its introduction the Audi RS6 was the benchmark when it came to extreme estate cars. Its performance was already very impressive, but according to the Audi tuners that still wasn't enough.

programme.title: AMG
programme.desc: The letters AMG sound rather magical in the ears of car enthusiasts. We took a look at some of the company's construction and racing history, their recent creations like the ML 63 SUV, as well as their "Black Series" range of vehicles.

programme.title: Sedan Offensive
programme.desc: The Volvo S90 offers Scandinavian elegance and a high level of security features. Jaguar entered the race with its performance sedan XF-S and Cadillac ramped up their luxury level with the CT6.

programme.title: Enduro Park Hechlingen
programme.desc: The BMW Enduro Park Hechlingen in Bavaria offers off-road driving pleasure both for beginners and pros alike on 26 hectares. We take a look at what this exciting place has to offer for enduro enthusiasts. Also: what does the inexpensive Hyosung ST 700 i from South Korea have to offer? And: the big-wheeled scooter from Taiwan, the Kymco People GT 300i.

programme.title: Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Episode 20
programme.desc: At the old-timer grand prix at the Nuerburgring you for example can see the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Episode 18
programme.desc: After the 24-hour race was over we left the Nuerburgring and moved to Büren, Germany, where the Raeder Motorsport company is based. They are famous for front-wheel drives with a great performance that put a lot of horsepower to the track.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Ready for Action
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of some of the exciting stunts at Action Concept, the biggest action movie production company in Europe. Also: Johannes and Ferdinand Stuck with the BMW Alpina D5 Twin Turbo at the test track. And: the Volkswagen Up city car.

programme.title: Changing the model
programme.desc: BMW got into the electric mobility business with their ActiveE and i3 models. We visited the company's technology office in Silicon Valley. Also: the Stuck brothers at the test track with the Mercedes C 63 AMG. And: the Audi A3 Sportback.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera World Cup
programme.desc: In June 2011 motor sports enthusiasts from all around the world eagerly awaited the start of the Porsche Carrera World Cup at the infamous Nürburgring Nordschleife. We show you some of the most exciting moments of this event.

programme.title: Audi R8 GT vs. Jaguar XKR
programme.desc: The ultimate competition: Aston Martin Virage vs. Jaguar XKR vs. Audi's R8 GT vs. Mercedes SLS. Also: Artega claims that their GT is a 'Porsche killer'. Is that so? And: Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel takes the Infinity FX50 to the test.

programme.title: Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Episode 13
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring shook when the VLN began its second leg of the tournament. We once again accompany you to this exciting competition, including the highlights of BMW's 1st leg win.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Ford Mustang vs Chevy Corvette
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Car lovers from the Middle East present their vehicles at the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. There is a weekend at the hotel to be won. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette are up for judging this time.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera World Cup
programme.desc: In June 2011 motor sports enthusiasts from all around the world eagerly awaited the start of the Porsche Carrera World Cup at the infamous Nürburgring Nordschleife. We show you some of the most exciting moments of this event.

programme.title: Audi R8 GT vs. Jaguar XKR
programme.desc: The ultimate competition: Aston Martin Virage vs. Jaguar XKR vs. Audi's R8 GT vs. Mercedes SLS. Also: Artega claims that their GT is a 'Porsche killer'. Is that so? And: Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel takes the Infinity FX50 to the test.

programme.desc: Car lovers from the Middle East present their vehicles at the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. There is a weekend at the hotel to be won. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette are up for judging this time.

programme.title: BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Episode 20
programme.desc: At the old-timer grand prix at the Nuerburgring you for example can see the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Audi Sport Quattro S1, Part 1
programme.desc: The Audi Sport quattro S1 is the most powerful and exciting rally car ever built. Based on the regular quattro, the S1 with its giant wings spread anxiety, fear and excitement among rally drivers and fans. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Rear-wheel drive for everyone
programme.desc: Cars with a rear-wheel drive are usually considered to be agile but also a bit capricious in regards to their handling. Does this also apply to the Porsche GT3 and the Smart? In addition: the sporty midsize sedan model range, BMW's 3 Series.

programme.title: Fresh Air Experience
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option. The Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people. When it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list. We took a closer look at these three open-top contenders.

programme.title: The 1994 Indy 500
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the most spectacular racing events in the world. More than 400.000 spectators watch this mixture of show and motorsports competition at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway each year. We take a look back at the 1994 Indy 500.

programme.title: Rally Year 1972 - A Ford success story
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which was run from 1970 to 1972. Car manufacturers such as Porsche, Renault, Opel and Ford took part in this competition, with Ford having an exceptionally successful year in 1972.

programme.title: German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera Cup 1990
programme.desc: 1990 was an extremely thrilling year at the Porsche Carrera Cup, the fastest and most exciting one-make racing event. Porsche started with the new Carrera 2 Cup Coupe with 265hp generated by a powerful 6-cylinder engine.

programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. One owner of this rare classic car is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams.

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Bizzarrini 5300 GT
programme.desc: Giotto Bizzarrini was the creator of the famous Ferrari GTO, but after arguments with his employer he left Ferrari early. To get back at Ferrari, Bizzarrini decided to create his own sports car: the Bizzarrini GT 5300.

programme.title: French Classics
programme.desc: French manufacturers have also built milestones in automotive history in the past, including lesser-known brands such as Delage and Talbot, but also vehicles from Peugeot, Renault and Citroen.

programme.title: Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Diesel Engines
programme.desc: It's all about Diesel this time. We compared the BMW 120d and the 125i. In addition: Audi's diesel-hybrid model R18 e-tron quattro dominated the endurance race in Le Mans. And: the diesel-powered Jaguar XF Sport Brake.

programme.title: Ford Mustang vs Chevy Corvette
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Car lovers from the Middle East present their vehicles at the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. There is a weekend at the hotel to be won. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette are up for judging this time.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Jaguar RS
programme.desc: Jaguar succeeded in finding new confidence and challenging their competitors with models like the XF-RS, XK-RS and F-Type. We took a look at the iconic British brand's latest developments.

programme.title: Blancpain Endurance Series 2013
programme.desc: The Blancpain Endurance Series is a racing event for grand tourers like the Ferrari 458 Italia, the McLaren MP4-12 C or the Nissan GT-R Nismo GT3. We took a look at all the action, the drivers, their cars at the 2013 competition.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Bike Crash
programme.desc: This time the team deals with motorbike stunts: high jumps, risky drops and dangerous crashes in the company's backyard. Stunt coordinator Domi requires his specialists to be in top shape and extremely focused.

programme.title: The Graduate
programme.desc: A vehicle jumps at full speed over four cars, which explode one after the other. It’s a matter of precision and timing for the Stunt Heroes. Also, up-and-coming stuntwoman Tina has to prove her skills.

programme.title: Lexus GSF vs McLaren MP4-12C
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: The competition for the coolest souped-up cars in the Middle East continues. The prize is an overnight stay for two at the Sofitel Jumeirah Beach. This time, the spotlight is on a Lexus GSF, a Ford Mustang and a McLaren MP4-12C.

programme.title: Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: Ferrari Testarossa
programme.desc: The Ferrari Testarossa is a dream car, but the 1000 PS Lotec Testarossa is even better and faster. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS is basically a race car. And: the Wiesmann MF3 is retired with a final edition.

programme.title: Morgan Plus 8
programme.desc: The second generation of the BMW M6, a dream car between sports car and luxury. Also: with the C-X75, the Jaguar shows how the dynamic future could look like. And: after eight years the Morgan Plus 8 is back.
